name: Road to Eternity
description:
On his way to eternity, he found himself surrounded by darkness...

A short experience with a dark twist. Best played alone at night.

Your objective is to walk (WASD) through the level and pick up artifacts (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, depending on the number of the artifact, this is due to a bug).

DISCLAIMER:

This game is still in very early but very active development. You are almost certainly going to encounter bugs

ROADMAP:

Things to fix:

 - There is currently no collision or level boundary

 - Lights pop in and out of existence depending on the player rotation

 - Detection whether the player is looking at an artifact doesn't work, you can skip the entire game

 - Make the picking up system more durable against key spamming or holding

 - The environment texture doesn't get rendered

 - Use one key for picking up artifacts

 - Compile in C instead of Krom

Things to add:

 - More assets and locations

 - Tweak post-processing and color grading

 - Pause menu and graphics options

 - End credits

 - Linux and Mac ports

 - Ambient OST

 - Replace font with a custom one

 - Source code to make the game open source

CREDITS:

Some of the textures used are from CC0 Textures

The super secret ending thing is made by Bryan Sanchinolo and modified for my purposes

Made in the Armory 3D game engine, assets created in Blender

Special thanks to:
